text: "If It's Lovin' That You Want" is a song by Barbadian singer Rihanna from her debut studio album, Music of the Sun (2005). It was written by Samuel Barnes, Scott La Rock, Makeba Riddick, Jean-Claude Oliver, Lawrence Parker, and produced by Poke & Tone. It was released on August 16, 2005, as the second and final single from the album. The song is about "basically telling a guy, 'If it's lovin' that you want, you should make me your girl because I've got what you need". ==Track listing== * Digital download # "If It's Lovin' That You Want" – 3:50 * CD single # "If It's Lovin' That You Want" (Album Version) – 3:28 # "If It's Lovin' That You Want" (Instrumental) – 3:20 # "Pon de Replay" (Pon de Club Play) – 7:32 # "If It's Lovin' That You Want" (Video) – 3:36 *Digital EP # "If It's Lovin' That You Want" – 3:27 # "If It's Lovin' That You Want" (Instrumental) – 3:20 # "Pon de Replay" (Pon de Club Play) – 7:32 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Weekly chart performance for "If It's Lovin' that You Want" Chart (2005–2006) Peak position scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Canada CHR/Pop Top 30 (Radio & Records) 5 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Romania (Romanian Top 100) 18 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" ===Year-end charts=== 2005 year-end chart performance for "If It's Lovin' that You Want" Chart (2005) Position UK Singles (OCC) 201 2006 year-end chart performance for "If It's Lovin' that You Want" Chart (2006) Position Australia (ARIA) 64 Australian Urban (ARIA) 18 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 69 ==Certifications== ==Release history== Release dates and formats for "If It's Lovin' that You Want" Region Date Format(s) Label(s) United States August 16, 2005 12-inch vinyl August 30, 2005 Rhythmic contemporary radio FMQB: Radio Industry News, Music Industry Updates, Arbitron Ratings, Music News and more!
